title: Community Alert: Online Transaction Safety (MPDC - Metropolitan Police Department)
text: ( Source : MPDC - Metropolitan Police Department ) The Metropolitan Police Department ( MPD ) has seen a recent trend of robberies where victims were targeted online. Both sellers and potential buyers were contacted to meet in-person regarding
